name: AP_CLAIM_PREV_SEQ_GRP
description: This table stores the previously received data used for claim sequencing when additional logic is necessary.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the claim info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PSEQ_GRP_ITM_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the type of value stored in I CLM 18768 from the previously received claim information, to be used in claim sequencing.

columns.name: PSEQ_GRP_ITM_CODE
columns.description: Stores the value or code for the type stored in I CLM 18767 from the previously received claim information, to be used in claim sequencing.
